name: Pocket Rummy
description:
Play the BEST rummy game on iOS!

Some call it "contract rummy", some call it "Phase 10", but you'll call it your best new way to have fun!

Complete all 10 levels first to win! Fill combos like "3 of a kind" or "3 in a row" to advance to the next level before your opponents do!

• NO ads
• NO additional purchases
• Tailored for the iPhone and iPad
• Delightful animations and sound
• Choose from 1 to 7 opponents
• Three difficulty levels for everyone
